games.game: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time

levels.title: Inside the Deku Tree
levels.description: Your first dungeon inside the guardian spirit of the Kokiri Forest. You must navigate through its hollowed interior, solving puzzles and defeating enemies.
levels.objective: Destroy the parasitic curse inside the Deku Tree by defeating Queen Gohma.
levels.strategy: Use your newly acquired slingshot to stun Queen Gohma and attack her eye when it's red.

levels.title: Inside the Deku Tree
levels.description: A mysterious forest dungeon inhabited by monsters and puzzles.
levels.objective: Find and eliminate the monster corrupting the tree.
levels.strategy: Use your newly acquired slingshot to stun Queen Gohma and attack her eye when it's red.

levels.title: Inside the Deku Tree
levels.description: The first challenge takes place inside a massive ancient tree. It's filled with traps, enemies, and brain-teasing puzzles that test your courage.
levels.objective: Locate and defeat the creature responsible for the curse inside the tree to bring peace to the Kokiri Forest.
levels.strategy: Use your newly acquired slingshot to stun Queen Gohma and attack her eye when it's red.

levels.title: Dodongo's Cavern
levels.description: A lava-filled cavern infested with Dodongos, where Goron food supplies are being blocked by dangerous creatures.
levels.objective: Defeat King Dodongo and restore access to the Goron's food supply.
levels.strategy: Use bombs to destroy obstacles and throw them into King Dodongo's mouth when he opens it to attack.

levels.title: Dodongo's Cavern
levels.description: A perilous volcanic cave filled with explosive Dodongos, preventing the Gorons from accessing vital food supplies.
levels.objective: Defeat King Dodongo to open the path and help the Gorons regain their food supply.
levels.strategy: Use bombs to destroy obstacles and throw them into King Dodongo's mouth when he opens it to attack.

levels.title: Dodongo's Cavern
levels.description: A hot, lava-laden underground lair teeming with Dodongos, blocking the Gorons from accessing their food reserves.
levels.objective: Eliminate King Dodongo to restore the Goron's food chain and remove the threat.
levels.strategy: Use bombs to destroy obstacles and throw them into King Dodongo's mouth when he opens it to attack.

levels.title: Dodongo's Cavern
levels.description: A treacherous cavern filled with lava and Dodongos, where the Gorons' food supply is blocked.
levels.objective: Defeat King Dodongo to restore the Goron's food supply.
levels.strategy: Use bombs to destroy obstacles and throw them into King Dodongo's mouth when he opens it to attack.

levels.title: Undead Burg
levels.description: A ruined medieval town filled with aggressive Hollow soldiers and treacherous ledges.
levels.objective: Defeat the Taurus Demon and unlock access to the Undead Parish.
levels.strategy: Use the towers to drop attack the Taurus Demon and dodge its heavy swings.

levels.title: Undead Burg
levels.description: An ancient, crumbling town filled with hostile Hollow warriors and perilous ledges that require caution.
levels.objective: Defeat the Taurus Demon to gain entry to the Undead Parish.
levels.strategy: Use the towers to drop attack the Taurus Demon and dodge its heavy swings.

levels.title: Undead Burg
levels.description: A dark, medieval town filled with undead enemies and treacherous paths.
levels.objective: Defeat the Taurus Demon to progress to the Undead Parish.
levels.strategy: Use the towers to drop attack the Taurus Demon and dodge its heavy swings.

levels.title: Anor Londo
levels.description: A grand but eerie city guarded by powerful Silver Knights and the infamous Ornstein and Smough.
levels.objective: Defeat Dragonslayer Ornstein and Executioner Smough to obtain the Lordvessel.
levels.strategy: Focus on taking down one boss first to avoid being overwhelmed; Ornstein is easier to fight alone.

levels.title: Anor Londo
levels.description: A majestic yet haunting city filled with powerful Silver Knights and the infamous duo of Ornstein and Smough.
levels.objective: Defeat Dragonslayer Ornstein and Executioner Smough to obtain the Lordvessel.
levels.strategy: Focus on taking down one boss first to avoid being overwhelmed; Ornstein is easier to fight alone.

levels.title: Anor Londo
levels.description: A grand, gothic city filled with powerful Silver Knights and the infamous duo of Ornstein and Smough.
levels.objective: Defeat Dragonslayer Ornstein and Executioner Smough to obtain the Lordvessel.
levels.strategy: Focus on taking down one boss first to avoid being overwhelmed; Ornstein is easier to fight alone.

levels.title: The Village
levels.description: Leon arrives in a remote European village, only to be ambushed by violent villagers.
levels.objective: Survive the village attack until the church bell rings.
levels.strategy: Barricade doors and use choke points to manage the horde. Aim for headshots and follow up with melee attacks.

levels.title: The Village
levels.description: Leon enters a secluded European village, only to face an onslaught of violent villagers attacking him.
levels.objective: Survive the attack from the villagers until the church bell rings to signal safety.
levels.strategy: Barricade doors and use choke points to manage the horde. Aim for headshots and follow up with melee attacks.

levels.title: The Village
levels.description: Upon arrival in a quiet European village, Leon is ambushed by an angry mob of hostile villagers.
levels.objective: Hold your ground and survive the ambush until the church bell tolls for help.
levels.strategy: Barricade doors and use choke points to manage the horde. Aim for headshots and follow up with melee attacks.

levels.title: The Castle
levels.description: A massive fortress filled with cultists, deadly traps, and the fearsome Verdugo.
levels.objective: Navigate through the castle and rescue Ashley.
levels.strategy: Use the environment to your advantage, conserve ammo, and be wary of ambushes from cultists.

levels.title: The Castle
levels.description: A grand fortress teeming with cultists, deadly traps, and the terrifying Verdugo stalking the halls.
levels.objective: Make your way through the castle and rescue Ashley from her captors.
levels.strategy: Use the environment to your advantage, conserve ammo, and be wary of ambushes from cultists.

levels.title: The Castle
levels.description: A towering fortress brimming with dangerous cultists, hazardous traps, and the menacing Verdugo lurking within.
levels.objective: Fight your way through the castle and save Ashley from the clutches of her enemies.
levels.strategy: Use the environment to your advantage, conserve ammo, and be wary of ambushes from cultists.

games.game: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time

levels.title: Inside the Deku Tree
levels.description: Your first dungeon inside the guardian spirit of the Kokiri Forest. You must navigate through its hollowed interior, solving puzzles and defeating enemies.
levels.objective: Destroy the parasitic curse inside the Deku Tree by defeating Queen Gohma.
levels.strategy: Use your newly acquired slingshot to stun Queen Gohma and attack her eye when it's red.

levels.title: Inside the Deku Tree
levels.description: Your first challenge inside the heart of the Kokiri Forest, a massive tree guarded by spirits. Navigate through its winding paths while solving puzzles and facing enemies.
levels.objective: Destroy the curse that plagues the Deku Tree by defeating Queen Gohma.
levels.strategy: Use your newly acquired slingshot to stun Queen Gohma and attack her eye when it's red.

levels.title: Inside the Deku Tree
levels.description: Explore the depths of the Deku Tree, the guardian spirit of Kokiri Forest. Solve puzzles and defeat enemies to progress through its hollow interior.
levels.objective: Defeat Queen Gohma to break the parasitic curse plaguing the Deku Tree.
levels.strategy: Use your newly acquired slingshot to stun Queen Gohma and attack her eye when it's red.

levels.title: Dodongo's Cavern
levels.description: A lava-filled cavern infested with Dodongos, where Goron food supplies are being blocked by dangerous creatures.
levels.objective: Defeat King Dodongo and restore access to the Goron's food supply.
levels.strategy: Use bombs to destroy obstacles and throw them into King Dodongo's mouth when he opens it to attack.

levels.title: Dodongo's Cavern
levels.description: A perilous volcanic cave filled with explosive Dodongos, preventing the Gorons from accessing vital food supplies.
levels.objective: Defeat King Dodongo to open the path and help the Gorons regain their food supply.
levels.strategy: Use bombs to destroy obstacles and throw them into King Dodongo's mouth when he opens it to attack.

levels.title: Dodongo's Cavern
levels.description: A hot, lava-laden underground lair teeming with Dodongos, blocking the Gorons from accessing their food reserves.
levels.objective: Eliminate King Dodongo to restore the Goron's food chain and remove the threat.
levels.strategy: Use bombs to destroy obstacles and throw them into King Dodongo's mouth when he opens it to attack.

games.game: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild

levels.title: Great Plateau
levels.description: The starting area where Link awakens and learns about the world after a century of slumber.
levels.objective: Activate the four Shrines and obtain the Paraglider.
levels.strategy: Use your Sheikah Slate to solve puzzles in each Shrine and gather resources for survival.

levels.title: Hyrule Field
levels.description: A vast open area filled with enemies, shrines, and the ruins of Hyrule.
levels.objective: Explore the area, gather resources, and defeat enemies to prepare for the journey ahead.
levels.strategy: Use stealth to avoid stronger enemies, gather materials for cooking, and complete Shrines for Spirit Orbs.

levels.title: Gerudo Desert
levels.description: A vast desert region with extreme temperatures and powerful enemies.
levels.objective: Find the Gerudo Town and uncover the secrets of the Gerudo tribe.
levels.strategy: Use heat-resistant elixirs, navigate sandstorms, and be cautious of enemy camps.

levels.title: Zora's Domain
levels.description: A beautiful, water-themed area inhabited by the Zora tribe.
levels.objective: Help the Zora and defeat the Waterblight Ganon.
levels.strategy: Use ice arrows to freeze water and create platforms, and be prepared for a challenging boss fight.

levels.title: Death Mountain
levels.description: A volcanic region filled with fire and lava hazards, home to the Goron tribe.
levels.objective: Defeat Fireblight Ganon and save the Gorons.
levels.strategy: Use heat-resistant armor, avoid lava pits, and utilize bombs against enemies.

levels.title: Hyrule Castle
levels.description: The final area where Link confronts Calamity Ganon and uncovers the history of Hyrule.
levels.objective: Defeat Calamity Ganon and save Princess Zelda.
levels.strategy: Prepare with powerful weapons, use elemental attacks against Ganon, and utilize the environment for cover.

levels.title: Undead Burg
levels.description: A ruined medieval town filled with aggressive Hollow soldiers and treacherous ledges.
levels.objective: Defeat the Taurus Demon and unlock access to the Undead Parish.
levels.strategy: Use the towers to drop attack the Taurus Demon and dodge its heavy swings.

levels.title: Undead Burg
levels.description: An ancient, crumbling town filled with hostile Hollow warriors and perilous ledges that require caution.
levels.objective: Defeat the Taurus Demon to gain entry to the Undead Parish.
levels.strategy: Use the towers to drop attack the Taurus Demon and dodge its heavy swings.

levels.title: Undead Burg
levels.description: A dark, medieval town filled with undead enemies and treacherous paths.
levels.objective: Defeat the Taurus Demon to progress to the Undead Parish.
levels.strategy: Use the towers to drop attack the Taurus Demon and dodge its heavy swings.

levels.title: Anor Londo
levels.description: A grand but eerie city guarded by powerful Silver Knights and the infamous Ornstein and Smough.
levels.objective: Defeat Dragonslayer Ornstein and Executioner Smough to obtain the Lordvessel.
levels.strategy: Focus on taking down one boss first to avoid being overwhelmed; Ornstein is easier to fight alone.

levels.title: Anor Londo
levels.description: A majestic yet haunting city filled with powerful Silver Knights and the infamous duo of Ornstein and Smough.
levels.objective: Defeat Dragonslayer Ornstein and Executioner Smough to obtain the Lordvessel.
levels.strategy: Focus on taking down one boss first to avoid being overwhelmed; Ornstein is easier to fight alone.

levels.title: Anor Londo
levels.description: A grand, gothic city filled with powerful Silver Knights and the infamous duo of Ornstein and Smough.
levels.objective: Defeat Dragonslayer Ornstein and Executioner Smough to obtain the Lordvessel.
levels.strategy: Focus on taking down one boss first to avoid being overwhelmed; Ornstein is easier to fight alone.

levels.title: The Village
levels.description: Leon arrives in a remote European village, only to be ambushed by violent villagers.
levels.objective: Survive the village attack until the church bell rings.
levels.strategy: Barricade doors and use choke points to manage the horde. Aim for headshots and follow up with melee attacks.

levels.title: The Village
levels.description: Leon enters a secluded European village, only to find himself surrounded by aggressive villagers who ambush him.
levels.objective: Survive the village's onslaught until the church bell rings to signal the end of the attack.
levels.strategy: Barricade doors and use choke points to manage the horde. Aim for headshots and follow up with melee attacks.

levels.title: The Village
levels.description: Upon reaching a remote European village, Leon is ambushed by a violent group of villagers intent on his destruction.
levels.objective: Hold out against the villagers' attack until the church bell tolls to signal the arrival of help.
levels.strategy: Barricade doors and use choke points to manage the horde. Aim for headshots and follow up with melee attacks.

levels.title: The Castle
levels.description: A massive fortress filled with cultists, deadly traps, and the fearsome Verdugo.
levels.objective: Navigate through the castle and rescue Ashley.
levels.strategy: Use the environment to your advantage, conserve ammo, and be wary of ambushes from cultists.

levels.title: The Castle
levels.description: A sprawling fortress, infested with dangerous cultists, deadly traps, and the terrifying Verdugo lurking in the shadows.
levels.objective: Fight your way through the castle's defenses and rescue Ashley from her captors.
levels.strategy: Use the environment to your advantage, conserve ammo, and be wary of ambushes from cultists.

levels.title: The Castle
levels.description: An enormous fortress brimming with deadly cultists, hazardous traps, and the fearsome Verdugo hunting you down.
levels.objective: Make your way through the castle and free Ashley from the clutches of the cultists.
levels.strategy: Use the environment to your advantage, conserve ammo, and be wary of ambushes from cultists.

levels.title: The Silent Cartographer
levels.description: A large-scale beach assault on a Covenant-controlled island.
levels.objective: Find and unlock the map room to locate the Control Room of Halo.
levels.strategy: Use grenades to clear groups of enemies, and take advantage of vehicles for mobility and firepower.

levels.title: The Silent Cartographer
levels.description: A large-scale assault on a beach, where you face off against the Covenant on their controlled island.
levels.objective: Locate and unlock the map room to gain access to the Control Room of Halo.
levels.strategy: Use grenades to clear groups of enemies, and take advantage of vehicles for mobility and firepower.

levels.title: The Silent Cartographer
levels.description: A beach assault on a Covenant-held island, where you must overcome enemy forces and obstacles.
levels.objective: Find the map room and unlock it to locate the Control Room on Halo.
levels.strategy: Use grenades to clear groups of enemies, and take advantage of vehicles for mobility and firepower.

levels.title: The Library
levels.description: A claustrophobic and repetitive level filled with relentless Flood enemies.
levels.objective: Escort 343 Guilty Spark and reach the Index.
levels.strategy: Use shotguns and grenades to deal with swarms of Flood, and keep moving to avoid getting overwhelmed.

levels.title: The Library
levels.description: A cramped, repetitive level teeming with relentless Flood enemies that swarm you from all directions.
levels.objective: Escort 343 Guilty Spark to the Index and reach your goal while fighting off the Flood.
levels.strategy: Use shotguns and grenades to deal with swarms of Flood, and keep moving to avoid getting overwhelmed.

levels.title: The Library
levels.description: A tight, repetitive environment filled with the overwhelming and relentless Flood enemies, testing your endurance.
levels.objective: Guide 343 Guilty Spark to the Index and navigate through the Flood's constant attacks.
levels.strategy: Use shotguns and grenades to deal with swarms of Flood, and keep moving to avoid getting overwhelmed.

levels.title: Bob-omb Battlefield
levels.description: A wide-open battlefield filled with rolling cannonballs, floating islands, and King Bob-omb.
levels.objective: Defeat King Bob-omb at the mountain top and collect the Power Star.
levels.strategy: Run behind King Bob-omb and throw him three times while avoiding the edge of the platform.

levels.title: Bob-omb Battlefield
levels.description: A vast battlefield filled with cannonballs rolling across the ground, floating islands, and the imposing King Bob-omb.
levels.objective: Climb to the mountaintop and defeat King Bob-omb to collect the Power Star.
levels.strategy: Run behind King Bob-omb and throw him three times while avoiding the edge of the platform.

levels.title: Bob-omb Battlefield
levels.description: A large open field where rolling cannonballs and floating platforms challenge you as you face King Bob-omb at the summit.
levels.objective: Defeat King Bob-omb at the top of the mountain and grab the Power Star.
levels.strategy: Run behind King Bob-omb and throw him three times while avoiding the edge of the platform.

levels.title: Cool, Cool Mountain
levels.description: A slippery, icy mountain with a giant snowman and a difficult slide challenge.
levels.objective: Find the lost baby penguin and return it to its mother.
levels.strategy: Carefully navigate the icy terrain, avoid falling off cliffs, and use the slide to reach areas quickly.

levels.title: Cool, Cool Mountain
levels.description: A slippery, snowy mountain filled with a giant snowman and a treacherous slide that tests your precision.
levels.objective: Find the lost baby penguin and return it to its worried mother.
levels.strategy: Carefully navigate the icy terrain, avoid falling off cliffs, and use the slide to reach areas quickly.

levels.title: Cool, Cool Mountain
levels.description: A frigid, icy mountain where you must tackle a giant snowman and conquer a perilous slide challenge.
levels.objective: Return the lost baby penguin to its mother on the icy mountain.
levels.strategy: Carefully navigate the icy terrain, avoid falling off cliffs, and use the slide to reach areas quickly.

levels.title: Shadow Moses Dock
levels.description: The infiltration point of the mission, where Snake sneaks past guards to enter the base.
levels.objective: Avoid detection and find a way into the main facility.
levels.strategy: Stay in the shadows, use vents to bypass guards, and avoid making noise on metal floors.

levels.title: Shadow Moses Dock
levels.description: The starting point of the mission, where Snake must sneak past patrolling guards to infiltrate the enemy base.
levels.objective: Avoid being seen and find a way to enter the main facility without alerting anyone.
levels.strategy: Stay in the shadows, use vents to bypass guards, and avoid making noise on metal floors.

levels.title: Shadow Moses Dock
levels.description: The first challenge of the infiltration, where Snake must evade guards and silently infiltrate the base.
levels.objective: Find a way into the main facility without being detected by the patrolling guards.
levels.strategy: Stay in the shadows, use vents to bypass guards, and avoid making noise on metal floors.

levels.title: Sniper Wolf Showdown
levels.description: A tense sniper battle in the snow against one of Foxhound's deadliest members.
levels.objective: Defeat Sniper Wolf without exposing yourself too much.
levels.strategy: Use cover effectively, take your time to aim, and rely on diazepam to steady your shots.

levels.title: Sniper Wolf Showdown
levels.description: A high-stakes sniper duel in the snowy landscape against one of Foxhound's most deadly assassins.
levels.objective: Outsmart and defeat Sniper Wolf while minimizing your exposure.
levels.strategy: Use cover effectively, take your time to aim, and rely on diazepam to steady your shots.

levels.title: Sniper Wolf Showdown
levels.description: A dangerous sniper battle in a snow-covered arena against Sniper Wolf, a skilled and lethal Foxhound member.
levels.objective: Defeat Sniper Wolf without leaving yourself vulnerable to her deadly shots.
levels.strategy: Use cover effectively, take your time to aim, and rely on diazepam to steady your shots.

levels.title: Bleak Falls Barrow
levels.description: An ancient Nordic tomb filled with undead Draugr and mysterious carvings.
levels.objective: Retrieve the Dragonstone and learn the first Word of Power.
levels.strategy: Use fire-based attacks against Draugr, solve the pillar puzzle, and be prepared for a boss fight at the end.

levels.title: Bleak Falls Barrow
levels.description: An eerie tomb with Draugr enemies and ancient Nordic carvings.
levels.objective: Find the Dragonstone and unlock the first Word of Power.
levels.strategy: Use fire spells to defeat Draugr, solve the pillar puzzle, and prepare for the boss fight at the end.

levels.title: Bleak Falls Barrow
levels.description: A long-forgotten tomb, home to Draugr and cryptic carvings.
levels.objective: Retrieve the Dragonstone and unlock your first Thu'um word.
levels.strategy: Use fire magic against Draugr, solve the intricate puzzles, and defeat the final boss at the tomb's end.

levels.title: The Throat of the World
levels.description: The highest peak in Skyrim, where the Dragonborn meets the ancient dragon Paarthurnax.
levels.objective: Learn the full power of the Thu'um and prepare for the final battle.
levels.strategy: Listen to Paarthurnax's wisdom, complete the training, and use Dragonrend to combat Alduin.

levels.title: The Throat of the World
levels.description: The tallest mountain in Skyrim, where the Dragonborn meets Paarthurnax, the ancient dragon.
levels.objective: Master the Thu'um and prepare for the ultimate battle.
levels.strategy: Hear Paarthurnax's teachings, complete the training, and use Dragonrend to defeat Alduin.

levels.title: The Throat of the World
levels.description: Skyrim's highest peak, where the Dragonborn learns from Paarthurnax and prepares to face Alduin.
levels.objective: Unlock the full potential of the Thu'um and confront Alduin.
levels.strategy: Complete Paarthurnax's training, learn the powerful shout, and use Dragonrend to defeat Alduin.

levels.title: Welcome to Rapture
levels.description: The eerie introduction to the underwater city, filled with Splicers and dark secrets.
levels.objective: Find a weapon and make your way to safety while learning about Rapture.
levels.strategy: Use the wrench for silent takedowns, search bodies for supplies, and conserve ammo for later.

levels.title: Welcome to Rapture
levels.description: The unsettling entry into the submerged city, full of lurking Splicers and hidden dangers.
levels.objective: Locate a weapon and escape while uncovering the mysteries of Rapture.
levels.strategy: Silent takedowns with the wrench, scavenge bodies for supplies, and save ammo for tougher enemies.

levels.title: Welcome to Rapture
levels.description: The eerie introduction to a crumbling underwater city, teeming with Splicers and dark secrets.
levels.objective: Find a weapon and navigate through Rapture’s dangerous streets to safety.
levels.strategy: Use the wrench to silently take down enemies, loot bodies for ammunition, and be mindful of scarce resources.

levels.title: Fort Frolic
levels.description: A twisted, neon-lit district ruled by the mad artist Sander Cohen.
levels.objective: Survive Cohen’s games and photograph his victims to progress.
levels.strategy: Use traps to control enemy movement, hack security turrets, and be prepared for sudden ambushes.

levels.title: Fort Frolic
levels.description: A dark, neon-filled district under the rule of the unstable artist Sander Cohen.
levels.objective: Survive the twisted games of Cohen and capture photos of his victims to continue.
levels.strategy: Set traps to control enemy movement, hack nearby turrets, and watch out for unexpected attacks.

levels.title: Fort Frolic
levels.description: A vibrant yet warped district dominated by the insane artist Sander Cohen, filled with strange exhibits and madness.
levels.objective: Outlast Cohen’s deadly games and photograph his victims to advance.
levels.strategy: Set traps to control your enemies, hack security turrets for support, and be ready for ambushes around every corner.

levels.title: The UAC
levels.description: The opening level of Doom, where you wake up in a hell-infested research facility.
levels.objective: Clear the area of demons and reactivate the base's security systems.
levels.strategy: Keep moving, use melee finishers for health, and switch weapons frequently to adapt to enemies.

levels.title: The UAC
levels.description: The first level of Doom, where you awaken in a facility overrun with hellish demons and chaos.
levels.objective: Eliminate all demons and restore security systems to regain control of the base.
levels.strategy: Stay mobile, use finishing moves to recover health, and quickly cycle through weapons to handle various enemies.

levels.title: The UAC
levels.description: The introductory level of Doom, where you find yourself in a research base taken over by demonic forces.
levels.objective: Clear the demons from the base and reactivate security to begin your assault.
levels.strategy: Constant movement is key, use melee kills to restore health, and adapt your weapon choice for each enemy type.

levels.title: Kadingir Sanctum
levels.description: A brutal hellscape filled with ancient ruins and relentless waves of demons.
levels.objective: Defeat the Hell Priests and push deeper into Hell.
levels.strategy: Use the Gauss Cannon for precision shots, exploit vertical movement, and save ammo for tougher enemies.

levels.title: Kadingir Sanctum
levels.description: A vicious hellish landscape filled with old ruins and unyielding demonic forces.
levels.objective: Defeat the Hell Priests to gain access to deeper parts of Hell.
levels.strategy: Use the Gauss Cannon for headshots, make use of vertical combat opportunities, and conserve ammunition for the hardest foes.

levels.title: Kadingir Sanctum
levels.description: A harsh, infernal environment full of ancient ruins and wave after wave of demons.
levels.objective: Defeat the Hell Priests and continue your journey deeper into the heart of Hell.
levels.strategy: Use the Gauss Cannon for long-range precision, navigate the vertical spaces, and ration your ammo for high-priority targets.

levels.title: Route Kanal
levels.description: Gordon Freeman escapes City 17 through the underground canal system while being pursued by Combine forces.
levels.objective: Reach Black Mesa East and avoid Combine patrols.
levels.strategy: Use cover to avoid gunfire, take out turrets strategically, and use the airboat for fast escapes.

levels.title: Route Kanal
levels.description: Gordon Freeman makes his way through the underground canals, trying to escape the Combine forces on his tail.
levels.objective: Navigate the canals and reach Black Mesa East without getting caught by the Combine.
levels.strategy: Hide behind cover to avoid gunfire, destroy turrets when possible, and use the airboat to speed past obstacles.

levels.title: Route Kanal
levels.description: In a desperate attempt to escape City 17, Gordon Freeman makes his way through the canal system, pursued by Combine forces.
levels.objective: Make your way to Black Mesa East, evading all Combine patrols along the way.
levels.strategy: Use cover to stay out of sight, eliminate turrets from a distance, and take advantage of the airboat for quick travel.

levels.title: Ravenholm
levels.description: A dark, horror-themed level filled with headcrab zombies and eerie abandoned buildings.
levels.objective: Navigate through the town and find a way to escape.
levels.strategy: Use the Gravity Gun to launch saw blades and explosive barrels at zombies while avoiding fast headcrabs.

levels.title: Ravenholm
levels.description: An eerie, horror-themed level where Gordon Freeman must face headcrab zombies while exploring the ruined town.
levels.objective: Survive the zombie infestation and find a way out of the haunted town.
levels.strategy: Use the Gravity Gun to throw saw blades and other explosives at zombies while staying alert for fast-moving headcrabs.

levels.title: Ravenholm
levels.description: A terrifying level filled with headcrab zombies and unsettling environments, set in an abandoned town.
levels.objective: Survive the zombie onslaught and escape the town before it's too late.
levels.strategy: Take advantage of the Gravity Gun to throw saw blades and explosive barrels at zombies, and always be prepared for fast headcrabs.

levels.title: Bank Robbery in Saint Denis
levels.description: Arthur and the gang attempt a high-stakes bank heist in the bustling city of Saint Denis.
levels.objective: Steal the money and escape the Pinkertons.
levels.strategy: Stay in cover, use Dead Eye to take out guards efficiently, and follow the planned escape route carefully.

levels.title: Bank Robbery in Saint Denis
levels.description: Arthur and the gang attempt a daring heist in the busy streets of Saint Denis, surrounded by law enforcement.
levels.objective: Grab the cash and escape the pursuing Pinkertons.
levels.strategy: Utilize cover, activate Dead Eye to neutralize guards, and stick to the planned route for the getaway.

levels.title: Bank Robbery in Saint Denis
levels.description: Arthur and his gang plan a bold bank robbery in the heart of Saint Denis, with danger closing in.
levels.objective: Rob the bank and flee from the Pinkertons hot on their trail.
levels.strategy: Take cover, use Dead Eye to dispatch guards quickly, and make sure to follow the escape route to avoid capture.

levels.title: Mount Hagen
levels.description: A snowy, final showdown between Arthur and Micah on the cold mountain peaks.
levels.objective: Defeat Micah and end the rivalry once and for all.
levels.strategy: Use cover in the harsh terrain, time your shots carefully, and prepare for a brutal close-quarters fight.

levels.title: Mount Hagen
levels.description: A deadly confrontation between Arthur and Micah in the freezing cold of Mount Hagen.
levels.objective: Take down Micah and settle the score once and for all.
levels.strategy: Make use of cover on the snow-covered peaks, time your shots to maximize damage, and be ready for intense hand-to-hand combat.

levels.title: Mount Hagen
levels.description: The final, bitter battle between Arthur and Micah takes place in the freezing heights of Mount Hagen.
levels.objective: Defeat Micah and put an end to the bitter feud.
levels.strategy: Use the harsh mountain terrain for cover, time your shots for maximum impact, and be prepared for a fierce melee battle.

levels.title: The Cold Boot
levels.description: The first set of test chambers after waking up, introducing new mechanics like the Thermal Discouragement Beam.
levels.objective: Solve the puzzles and progress through the Aperture facility.
levels.strategy: Use reflection cubes to redirect lasers, and look for hidden panels to place portals in unexpected ways.

levels.title: The Cold Boot
levels.description: Chell wakes up in the testing facility, facing new challenges including the Thermal Discouragement Beam.
levels.objective: Complete the puzzles and move forward through the Aperture Science testing chambers.

levels.title: The Cold Boot
levels.description: The initial series of chambers that introduce Chell to Aperture Science's testing environment, with new mechanics like the Thermal Discouragement Beam.
levels.objective: Progress through the chambers by solving puzzles and navigating the facility.
levels.strategy: Use cubes to reflect lasers, and look for spots to place portals to advance to the next test chamber.

levels.title: The Escape
levels.description: Chell breaks free from testing and navigates the decaying facility while Wheatley guides her.
levels.objective: Escape Aperture Science before GLaDOS catches you.

levels.title: The Escape
levels.description: Chell begins her journey to escape the crumbling Aperture facility, with Wheatley’s advice helping her evade GLaDOS’s detection.
levels.objective: Escape the facility before GLaDOS can catch up.
levels.strategy: Use momentum and velocity-based puzzles, avoid turrets, and follow Wheatley’s directions to find your way out.

levels.title: The Escape
levels.description: Chell escapes from the testing facility with the help of Wheatley, navigating through the facility’s deteriorating infrastructure.

levels.title: Kaer Morhen

levels.objective: Defend Kaer Morhen against the Wild Hunt's invasion.

levels.title: Kaer Morhen
levels.description: Geralt and Ciri must hold the ancient Witcher stronghold against the Wild Hunt’s forces.
levels.objective: Repel the invaders and protect Kaer Morhen.
levels.strategy: Use bombs, traps, and teamwork with allies to manage and eliminate large enemy groups.

levels.title: The Battle of Kaer Trolde
levels.description: A large-scale battle against the Wild Hunt on the icy Skellige shores.
levels.objective: Defend the fortress and drive back the enemy forces.
levels.strategy: Use fire magic to counter frost enemies, work with Skellige warriors, and target enemy mages first.

levels.title: The Battle of Kaer Trolde
levels.description: A fierce battle at Kaer Trolde on the frozen Skellige coast, where Geralt leads the charge against the Wild Hunt.
levels.objective: Protect the fortress and defeat the enemy forces.
levels.strategy: Utilize fire-based magic to counter ice-based enemies, cooperate with the Skellige warriors, and eliminate enemy spellcasters first.

levels.title: The Battle of Kaer Trolde
levels.description: The Skellige shores turn into a battlefield as Geralt and his allies face off against the Wild Hunt’s forces.
levels.objective: Defend Kaer Trolde and push back the attacking enemies.

levels.description: Michael, Franklin, and the team execute a high-stakes robbery of a jewelry store in Los Santos.
levels.objective: Steal the jewelry and get away from the police pursuit.

levels.title: The Jewel Store Job
levels.description: Michael, Franklin, and the crew target a jewelry store in a high-risk robbery in Los Santos.

levels.objective: Steal a fortune in gold and get away from the police.

levels.description: Kratos and Atreus venture through a dark and dangerous cave, filled with riddles and hostile enemies, as they try to save Faye.
